content:
In the Kharkiv direction, the servicemen of the Guard "Steel border" worked out on the accumulation of Russians.

VideoPublishedPress Center of the State Border Guard Service of Ukraine.

"Aeraconian of the Guard Brigade of the offensive" Steel border "conducted a statistical study. According to the results of the study, the border guards found that one of the 6 invaders hidden in the hole survives one, ”the video is said.

As the Armyinform writes, border guards in the Kharkiv directiondiscovered two occupiers' cars and struck themwith shock drones.
title: Defense forces worked on the Russians in Kharkiv region: from six occupiers in the hole survived one
description: The video was posted by the Press Center of the State Border Guard Service of Ukraine. “Aero -intelligence ...
author: Army Inform
